mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.requester AS "requester.id", bbq.nickname AS "requester.nickname", a.responder AS "responder.id", bbs.nickname AS "responder.nickname", wxar.id AS "article.id", wxar.title AS "article.title", wxar.url AS "article.url", wxac.id AS "account.id", wxac.name AS "account.name", wxacq.id AS "requestAccount.id", wxacq.name AS "requestAccount.name", a.subject_type AS "subjectType", a.subject_id AS "subjectId", a.type AS "type", a.status AS "status", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", uu.name AS "updateBy.name", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"

LEFT JOIN sys_user uu ON uu.id = a.update_by LEFT JOIN mod_broker bbq ON bbq.id = a.requester LEFT JOIN mod_broker bbs ON bbs.id = a.responder LEFT JOIN wx_article wxar ON wxar.id = a.subject_id LEFT JOIN wx_account wxac ON wxac.id = a.subject_id LEFT JOIN wx_account wxacq ON wxacq.id = a.request_account
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wx_forward( id, requester, request_account, responder, subject_type, subject_id, type, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{requester.id}, #{requestAccount.id}, #{responder.id}, #{subjectType}, #{subjectId}, #{type}, #{status}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE wx_forward SET requester = #{requester.id}, request_account = #{requestAccount.id}, responder = #{responder.id}, subject_type = #{subjectType}, subject_id = #{subjectId}, type = #{type}, status = #{status}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
